name: .NET, C#, Azure developer
description:
Our branch in UAE is looking for a full time remote .NET, C# developer with Azure and Javascript experience for a large project. The project is the top 1 platform for provisioning virtual desktops for big companies based on Azure technologies. Over 1M people use the platform every day.

Desired Candidate Profile:

  • Excellent knowledge of .net framework;

  • Ability to effectively solve complex problems in highly loaded multicomponent environment;

  • At least 2 years of experience

  • Knowledge of Javascript frontend development is a plus

This is long term work. For this position, we can offer a competitive salary and work on an interesting and in-demand project with a wide variety of tasks, ranging from integration with various systems to the development of new large functional components. We offer relocation to Turkey or Georgia.

A little about our company:

We have been operating since 2013. We have more than 70 developers from different cities on the planet. All developers are highly qualified and work with modern technologies. Some of our developers have PhD degree and diplomas of programming competitions. We offer a competitive salary, remote job, pleasant and professional colleagues, adequate management, and a minimum of bureaucracy.

Our advantages:

  • Remote work;

  • Reward for writing technical articles;

  • Yearly bonuses;

  • Transparent growth of technical skills within the company based on the roadmap;

  • Electronic problem book on programming;

  • Overtime pay;
